body.para: The ATC Maintenance screen is used for each of the following units:

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:5px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: ATC Maintenance mode enable can be protected by password in the User Management screen.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:14px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:4px; margin-left:48px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:4px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#0000ff;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:4px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: Ensure the user level privilege is enabled for ATC Maintenance mode.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:100px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#0000ff;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:100px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ;

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#0000ff;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: key on the MDI panel to display the Navigation Menu screen.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;

text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;

text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: On the ATC Maintenance screen, press the
soft key to activate ATC maintenance mode.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: If a warning “EX2040 MACHINE NOT STOP” appears, reset the warning and press the
key on MDI panel. Then try the above steps again.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:27px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;

text-align:center; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:27px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-before:always; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

table.style: border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid;

para.style: margin-top:2px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:3px;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:2px; margin-left:3px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: The items which maintenance can be performed individually with the following solenoids/actuators.

para.style: margin-top:2px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:3px;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:2px; margin-left:3px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: The current status, symbol and address of each actuator/solenoid and limit switch are displayed.

para.style: margin-top:2px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:3px;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:3px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Single Mode: Movement is performed to the end point (single step) when the

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:2px; margin-left:3px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Jog mode: Movement is performed while the
button is held down and stops when it is released.

para.style: margin-top:2px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:3px;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:2px; margin-left:3px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: button to the perform the maintenance operation.

para.style: margin-top:2px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:3px;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:2px; margin-left:3px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: ATC magazine operation mode selections and status are displayed.

para.style: margin-top:2px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:3px;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:2px; margin-left:3px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Provides operation advice when the maintenance operation could not be performed.

para.style: margin-top:2px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:3px;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:2px; margin-left:3px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Information required for operating the ATC arm and magazine are displayed.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:14px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:4px; margin-left:48px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: Observe the following conditions before doing the ATC maintenance operation.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:100px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:100px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ;
li.text: Ensure the ATC arm and the ATC magazine are in stop condition.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:100px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ;
li.text: Ensure all the feed axes (X, Y, Z, 4, 5) are in the safe position.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:100px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ;

text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:100px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ;
li.text: Release ATC Manual Intervention mode on the ATC operation panel.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:100px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ;
li.text: Release the Tool Call mode on the Tool Data Management screen.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:100px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ;
li.text: soft key on the ATC Maintenance screen

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: In normal situation, the Z-axis need to move to the 2nd reference position and a spindle orientation is required.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: If step 2 is not established due to the ATC arm position not in standby, press the
button on the main operator panel while activating the ATC maintenance item.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-before:always; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
